DOC.brief_summary: The COBIS III registry multi-center , real-world registry 2nd generation drug-eluting stenting coronary bifurcation lesion South Korea . From 31 major coronary intervention center Korea , total 3,000 patient ( anticipate ) enrol database January 2010 December 2014 . The aim study investigate long-term clinical result predictor adverse outcomes percutaneous coronary intervention 2nd generation drug-eluting stent coronary bifurcation lesion South Korea .
DOC.brief_title: Korean Coronary Bifurcation Stenting ( COBIS ) Registry III
DOC.criteria: Age > =19 year Any type de novo bifurcation lesion major epicardial artery : unprotected leave main coronary bifurcation lesion , LAD diagonal , LCXOM , distal RCA bifurcation . ( Excluding RCARV branch bifurcation , branch bifurcation ) Side branch LCX reference diameter > = 2.3 mm least stentable 2.5 mm stent Treated drugeluting stent period 2010 . 1 ~ 2014 . 12 Protected left main disease previous CABG LAD LCX territory Cardiogenic Shock History CPR hospitalization
